text: It is good to have an end to journey towards, but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
author: Ursula Le Guin

text: All my life, I've been fearful of defeat. But now that it has come, it's not near as terrible as I'd expected. The sun still shines, water still tastes good. Glory is all well and good, but life is enough, nay?
The thing about life, you need to keep something on the to-do list.
Contemplate the marvel that is existence, and rejoice that you are able to do so.
author: Ted Chiang

text: At midnight, sleep at last took pity on the Hegemon.
author: Mikhail Bulgakov
